not_finded_information_block.title: Didn't Find What You Were Looking For?

faqItems.question: What is a 'server without installation'?
faqItems.answerDescription: For ordering any dedicated servers in Germany and Finland, installation payment is required. As you may know, sooner or later, users have to part with their servers for various reasons. We offer you to purchase servers whose installation has been paid by other clients. This way, you get the opportunity to save up to 50% on the order cost.

faqItems.question: How does a dedicated server differ from VDS/VPS?
faqItems.answerTitle: How does a dedicated server differ from VDS/VPS?
faqItems.answerDescription: First and foremost, it is worth noting the difference in services, in that a dedicated server is physical hardware. This is a device whose resources are entirely at your disposal, without sharing with anyone else. You get full power and manage it as you wish within the existing rules. Dedicated servers significantly surpass regular VDS in power and conditions, making them the most logical and justified choice for large-scale projects.

faqItems.question: How to manage a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerTitle: How to manage a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerDescription: After activating the service, the user, similar to a virtual server, receives all the necessary data to work. In some locations, access to the cloud control panel is provided, where you can use features such as automatic OS reinstallation, activate SystemRescue, and many other capabilities.

faqItems.question: How long does it take to install a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerTitle: How long does it take to install a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerDescription: Different locations allocate different time periods for server installation. In case of potential delays, employees will notify you in advance about the installation and equipment activation timelines. According to our regulations, service processing time is up to 48 hours.

faqItems.question: What DDoS protection is provided on servers?
faqItems.answerTitle: What DDoS protection is provided on servers?
faqItems.answerDescription: By default, all our dedicated servers are equipped with standard DDoS protection, which is sufficient to repel small attacks or when you know that serious attacks on your server are not expected. But if you have unscrupulous competitors or server operation is critical, in some locations, we offer additional connection of servers to advanced DDoS protection, which will withstand even the largest attacks with a traffic volume of up to 3.5 Tbit/s. Learn more.
